R

raiseDefense() - Method in class assignment6monsters.Monster
method to raise defense value by 1, as long as the object is alive and has less than 20 defense presently
raiseFerocity() - Method in class assignment6monsters.Monster
method to raise ferocity value by 1, as long as the object is alive and has less than 20 ferocity presently
raiseHealth(int) - Method in class assignment6monsters.Monster
method to heal the object following a successful battle cry from an Orc Warlord object
raiseLeadership() - Method in class assignment6monsters.OrcWarlord
method to raise leadership by 1, so long as this object is alive and has less than 5 leadership at present.
raiseMagic() - Method in class assignment6monsters.Monster
method to raise magic value by 1, as long as the object is alive and has less than 20 magic presently
